title: Google honors Saul Bass
content: Today is the birthday of Saul Bass and the Google logo is a video tribute. Check it.
author: BlueStreak

comments.content:
Nice.  
What's that font on the opening "GOOGLE"?

hhp

A very clever game of spot-the-movie.  
Bass was not always so cute:  
 [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vDgIGRuLdPk](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820034419/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=vDgIGRuLdPk "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vDgIGRuLdPk")
